CustomField.formula: IF( OR( INCLUDES(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, 'Former Trustee'), INCLUDES(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, 'Honorary Trustee'), INCLUDES(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, 'Life Trustee'), INCLUDES(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, 'Trustee Spouse'), INCLUDES(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, 'Trustee Widow/er Spouse'), INCLUDES(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact_Type__c, 'Voting Trustee') ) ,true,false)
CustomField.label: Is Trustee
